metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4468 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple integer overflows in the search_chunk function in chmd.c in libmspack before 0.5 allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted CHM file.

criterions.comment: libmspack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
